first_place.subject: Congrats on the first place on TriviaQuiz game!🎉
first_place.content2:
Success requires a lot of hard work along with the right attitude.
You have used both to achieve great things, and we can't wait to see what you are going to do next.
Continue to enjoy our TriviaQuiz game!

second_place.subject: Congrats on the second place on TriviaQuiz game!🎉
second_place.content2:
Hardworking players like you always perform successfully in their quizzes.
We are deeply honored to give you this award!
Continue to enjoy our TriviaQuiz game!

third_place.subject: Congrats on the third place on TriviaQuiz game!🎉
third_place.content2:
You have earned our utmost respect and admiration.
Thank you for always bringing your best to the table.
We are deeply honored to give you this award!
Continue to enjoy our TriviaQuiz game!

premium_player.subject: Congrats on becoming Premium Player of TriviaQuiz game!🎉
premium_player.content2:
Hats off to you for this amazing victory!
You are an inspiration to many and a promise of great things ahead!
Continue to enjoy our TriviaQuiz game!

premium_member.subject: Congrats on becoming Premium Member of TriviaQuiz server!🎉
premium_member.content2:
Congratulations on making us all green-eyed monsters. So envious of your success. And so happy for you!
Continue to enjoy our TriviaQuiz game!
